thread.title: U.N. delays vote on Syria ceasefire, as deadly missiles fall

title: U.N. delays vote on Syria ceasefire, as deadly missiles fall
text:
U.N. delays vote on Syria ceasefire, as deadly missiles fall Friday, February 23, 2018 - 01:19 
The U.N. Security Council delayed a vote, Friday, on a demand for a 30-day ceasefire in Syria where pro-government warplanes have been pounding eastern Ghouta, reportedly killing over 460 people.   U.N. Security Council delayed a vote, Friday, on a demand for a 30-day ceasefire in Syria where pro-government warplanes have been pounding eastern Ghouta, reportedly killing over 460 people.  //reut.rs/2EMtWNw
